name: cmpfiref
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c1))))

stmt.origin: crefdf(s0, c0, ccmp, c1, c2, cfn, wcel(cv(s0), cfn))
stmt.pretty: crefdf(s0, c0, ccmp, c1, c2, cfn, s0 ∈ Fin)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccmp), wss(c1, c0), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))), wrex(s0, cpw(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wbr(cv(s0), cref, c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
-| wceq(ccmp, ccref(cfn))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wcel(cv(s0), cfn))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, cfn)
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ⊆ c0 ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1)→ ∃(s0 ∈ P(c0),(s0 ∈ Fin ∧ s0[Ref]c1)))
⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
⊣ Comp = CovHasRef(Fin)
⊣ (s0 ∈ Fin → s0 ∈ Fin)
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c1)
⊣ d(s0, Fin)

comment: Every open cover of a Compact space has a finite refinement. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Feb-2020.)
